Articles.Content:
sharing my first ship on here as i think its the only one of my crations worth sharing.

Its called the Ulysses 2A as the first version, the ulysses 1 only had a single row of tanks and i added a set of boosters to the final stage to make it the Ulysses 2A. The only mod i have installed is mechjeb. once the boosters are separated you can press key 9 to extend the solar panels. key 8 extends the antennas and toggles science equipment.

the center tanks empty in succession. once empty you can jettison one by one saving a total of 1.75 tons. it does however create a lot of debris for one mission.

ive had it as far out as jool, havent tested it for eeloo yet. the upper stage is a lander equipped with parachutes and thrusters should you wish to land. currently only meant for one way trips, working on a few versions which incorporates a hab module and docking capability.

images

http://imgur.com/a/uKk6y#0

ship file

https://www.dropbox.com/s/g0dcpx4rvsmlp75/Ulysses%202A.craft

feel free to modify but please give me a small shout on upon sharing

please let me know how i did

thanks for looking.

Looks good, but some photos in better lighting of later stages would be nice.

Cheers,

PIRATEONTHERUN
